body.bibl: Monferrer-Sala, Juan Pedro. “A Summary in Michael the Syrian’s ‘Chronography’ and Its Companions in Greek, Syriac and Arabic, With an Incursion in Ethiopic.” In Multilingual and Multigraphic Documents and Manuscripts of East and West, edited by Giuseppe Mandalà and Inmaculada Pérez Martín, 463–84.
